title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2052.11 - Miscellaneous
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2052.11 - Miscellaneous

State Regulations
(a) No provision of
this Part shall be the basis for any claim based on this Part against the
corporation or any of its directors, officers or employees. (b) This Part shall not alter the rights and
obligations of any contract of the corporation with a third party executed
before adoption of this Part, nor shall this Part be deemed to alter the terms
of any contract or affect the validity of any contract made in violation of or
without compliance with this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2052.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
